feed.title: Category: Xenosaga Episode 1: Der Wille zur Macht | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Xenosaga Episode 1: Der Wille zur Macht (PS2, 2003)
entry.content: So I've beaten Xenosaga just the other day. It was a pretty good game, although what was said about it being very much like a movie is very true. Although it was certainly a good movie. perhaps one of the annoying things about it as a game was that there was no real need to utilize all your characters. After I had everyone I just stuck with a particular grouping for the whole game.
